Items.Title: Oversight - Truck Routes
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to redesigning the city truck route network
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Redesigning the city truck route network.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the department of transportation to study street design as a means to limit or reduce the use by commercial vehicles of streets in residential neighborhoods
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of transportation to study street design as a means to limit or reduce the use by commercial vehicles of streets in residential neighborhoods.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to parking for tractor trailers and other commercial trucks
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Parking for tractor trailers and other commercial trucks.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature and Governor to fully fund the Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) in the State’s upcoming Fiscal Year 2024 Budget in an effort to ensure that: public transit riders have effective, affordable public transportation; the MTA maintains fiscal stability in the face of a looming fiscal cliff; and the MTA operate more frequent bus and train service statewide.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature and Governor to fully fund the Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) in the State’s upcoming Fiscal Year 2024 Budget.

Items.Title: Oversight - Truck Routes
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to redesigning the city truck route network
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Redesigning the city truck route network.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to parking for tractor trailers and other commercial trucks
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Parking for tractor trailers and other commercial trucks.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of transportation to study street design as a means to limit or reduce the use by commercial vehicles of streets in residential neighborhoods.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature and Governor to fully fund the Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) in the State’s upcoming Fiscal Year 2024 Budget in an effort to ensure that: public transit riders have effective, affordable public transportation; the MTA maintains fiscal stability in the face of a looming fiscal cliff; and the MTA operate more frequent bus and train service statewide.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature and Governor to fully fund the Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) in the State’s upcoming Fiscal Year 2024 Budget.
